name: Iron-Studded Utility Belt
description: A heavy-duty leather belt reinforced with iron studs and multiple utility pouches for the practical warrior

physical_properties.buckle_type: Heavy iron buckle with double prong

special_properties.utility_master: Increases effectiveness of carried tools by 10%
special_properties.sturdy_construction: Cannot be destroyed by normal wear and tear
special_properties.combat_ready: Quick-draw bonus for belt-mounted weapons and tools

flavor_text: Crafted by the renowned Smith's Guild of Ironhold, this belt has served countless warriors through siege and battle. The iron studs bear the marks of deflected blows, while the leather shows the patina of honest work and dedication.

lore.historical_significance: Standard issue for city guards and professional soldiers

visual_description.appearance: A wide, dark brown leather belt with gleaming iron studs arranged in protective patterns
visual_description.details: Four reinforced pouches hang at strategic positions, with metal loops for tool attachment
visual_description.wear_patterns: Shows honest use with slight scuffing on high-contact areas
visual_description.distinctive_features: The Ironhold smith's mark stamped into the buckle

upgrade_paths: Steel-Studded Utility Belt (+5 AR, +10% carrying capacity)
Masterwork Iron Belt (+8 AR, additional special properties)

metadata.author: PrimalMyst Development Team
metadata.notes: Example armor type belt with Marsalis alignment and utility focus
